fields.name: predictionCol
fields.title: Prediction Column
fields.description: The prediction column created during model scoringThe name of the column containing predictions generated by the clustering algorithm.

fields.name: metric
fields.title: Metric Column
fields.description: The distance metric to use for evaluating the clustering algorithm. This can be set to 'cosine', 'precomputed', or another valid metric.

fields.name: forceAllFinite
fields.title: Force All Finite
fields.description: Indicates whether to raise an error if any of the input data contains non-finite values.
